overview:
Chip Terry runs product and strategy at BzzAgentâ€”when heâ€™s not out sailing or doing some other silly outdoor activity. He is responsible for listening to client demands, understanding the capabilities of a fast changing technology/media landscape, and making sure BzzAgentâ€™s solutions solve true needs for clients and agents.

Prior to BzzAgent, Chip held a variety of product and marketing roles including VP of Marketing and Strategy at Forrester Research and GM of the Sales Intelligence business at ZoomInfo. His first product management job was launching the highly successful CD ROM versions of Princeton Reviewâ€™s GMAT, LSAT and GRE test prep classes.

Chip is also on the board of Courageous Sailing, a youth charity in Boston that give free sailing lessons to over 1,200 kids every summer. He has a BA from Tufts University and actually did a PhD in American History at Boston University where he received a full merit scholarship, won a grant from the American Historical Society, and studied with a Pulitzer and MacArthur award winning historian. In his free time, Chip is an avid sailor, mountain biker, skier and occasional poker player.

relationships.title: VP, GM of Product and Strategy
